content: ]ABOUT THE CAMPAIGNYo!Mix.io is an innovative mixing technology, brings anonymity to everyone. You are not required to use any other cryptocurrencies, because now Bitcoin can be fully anonymous. Participants of this signature campaign are encouraged to make a discussion on their official ANN: [banned mixer] | Best Bitcoin Mixer | Low fees | Fully automatedAs the campaign manager, I hold marketing budget and every week I update existing balance. When you are joining the campaign, please read the latest post to know escrow balance. If there are not enough balance for coming weeks then join at your own risk however it's always expected the when funds are not sufficient the management will top up the escrow balance.ONIONN ADDRESShttp://[banned mixer]CAMPAIGN REWARD (PAYROLL) Merit rank (Above 3K Earned Merit): $5.00 per post, up to 40 posts per week.Legendary/Hero: $3.00 per post, up to 40 posts per week.Sr. Member: $2.00  per post, up to 40 posts per week.Full Member: $1.5  per post, up to 40 posts per week.Avatar Campaign (Avatar + Personal Text): $1.00  per post, up to 20 posts per week...NOTE :.. Spam / Low quality post - will not be paid. Click here to read few quick suggestionsPREVENT AI DOMINATIONThis campaign is protected by Prevent AI Domination terms defined here:💹📈 Bitcointalk Campaign Management 💪🔥 Signature & Bounty ▶️ If I find campaign members breaching these terms, I will remove them from the campaign immediately. ▶️ If you find AI-written posts for this campaign and report them to me publicly or via PM, you will receive the weekly payment instead of the accused campaigner (if your report was successful). Please include as much evidence as possible when submitting a report.CAMPAIGN RULES▶️ Wear the appropriate signature, avatar and personal text during the campaign▶️ Posts should be minimum of 200 characters long and MUST BE constructive▶️ Posts in the following boards/sections are not eligible: "Off-Topic", "Archival, Games & Rounds", "Investor-Based Games", "Wall Observers", "Serious Discussion", "Altcoin Discussion", "Lending", "Press", "Politics & Society", other signature campaign threads, including this one, any ANN threads (except Yo!Mix ANN and ANN posted on the "Gambling" board are allowed), and areas where the signature is not visible▶️ No valid negative from DT network unless prior pproved by me▶️ Multi-account (alts) can apply but will need to give up all except only one if accepted more than one.▶️ You must have minimum 20 merits in the last 120 days▶️ Join my Telegram group: https://t.me/R7BountyQAIMPORTANT INFORMATION▶️ You are not allowed to change anything on the signature code, if found then you will be disqualified without prior notice.▶️ I reserve the full right to add/remove any participants, push/cancel/reopen the campaign or any rules of this campaign.▶️ Week starts from Saturday and ends on Friday UTC▶️ Please check the spreadsheet comment column regularly, and also always check your payment information.▶️ Let me know your alternative choice of payroll in case I can not fit you in the Merit rank (Above 3K Earned Merit).HOW TO APPLYReply to this thread with the following informationCode:Rank/Payroll:Alternative choice (optional): Merit earned in the last 120 days:Bech32 address:..SPREADSHEET..AVATAR   https://i.ibb.co/6yLszQP/yomix1.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/1b4Gz5K/yomix2.pngPERSONAL TEXT[banned mixer] : New Algorithm,
